docreader.range

Class RequirementReaderTextual

  • java.lang.Object
    • docreader.range.RequirementReaderTextual
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericReader<java.lang.Integer>, RequirementReaderI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RequirementReaderRange

    public class RequirementReaderTextual
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequirementReaderI
    Reader for requirements which are non-floating (no figures, no tables); does not support nested structures (i.e. this will always create exactly one requirement no matter how lengthy / complex the input is)
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

      • readAbstractSingleParagraph

        protected int readAbstractSingleParagraph(int paragraphOffset)
        Reads a requirement under the assumption it only contains a single paragraph; from this paragraph only interesting parts may be specified
        Parameters:
        paragraphOffset - offset of the paragraph in the enclosing range
        characterRunStartOffset - startOffset of the first characterRun to read
        characterRunEndOffset - end offset of the last characterRun to read (inclusive)
        Returns:
        the number of paragraphs to skip (that is: 0-based number of paragraphs read); always 0 here

      • determineLastWordOfPreviousParagraph

        private java.lang.String determineLastWordOfPreviousParagraph(int paragraphOffset)
        Determine the last word of the preceding paragraph; used for requirement links
        Parameters:
        paragraphOffset - offset of the preceding paragraph
        Returns:
        the last word and a trailing space or an empty string if there was no preceding paragraph; never null
